channel.title: Games on Solidmecha Games
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Solidmecha Games

item.title: Paint By Numbers
item.description: Each tile has a correct color. In standard mode, the colors of adjacent tiles are revealed in the venn diagram. In maniacal mode the colors of the surrounding tiles may be mixed or separated randomly within the diagrams.

item.title: Lantern
item.description: Bring light to the darkness. Watch your health, willpower, and stamina. The signs give your chances of what might happen if you continue in that direction.

item.title: DynaMem
item.description: Reveal the numbers 1 to 9. Selecting a number out of order will shift the entire row to the right, the whole column down, or both depending on the symbol of the block. No counter on this one. Take your time.

item.title: NUP
item.description: The Star needs to get to the red square! Pieces travel orthogonally until they hit a wall or another piece. Click on a piece to select, then click on a circle to move. Rarely the level generated will be not solvable you can always hit Shuffle or New Level.
